valueMarkdown.value: Initatied by the HCEMR once a Smart Health Link provided by a Pilgrim has been scanned.

See the [Smart Health Link - Manifest](https://docs.smarthealthit.org/smart-health-links/spec/#shlink-manifest-request) specifcation with the following modifications: - The *contentType* entry MAY also include the value "application/pdf" in the case that the corresponding *location* entry of the Smart Health Link is for a PDF rendering of the Verifiable Digital Health Certificate (e.g. Verifiable IPS). - The *contentType* entry MAY also include the value "text/html" in the case that the corresponding *location* entry of the Smart Health Link is for an external viewing portal for Verifiable Digital Health Certificate (e.g. Verifiable IPS). - The *contentType* entry MAY also include the value "text/html" in the case that the corresponding *location* entry of the Smart Health Link is a Verifiable Digital Health Certificate (e.g. Verifiable IPS).
